alert.note: Alert for Eastern Hampden; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued September 19 at 7:47PM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southern Worcester and east central Hampden Counties through 830 PM EDT... At 747 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm near Sturbridge, or 18 miles southwest of Worcester, moving east at 35 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 40 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Worcester, Shrewsbury, Grafton, Holden, Webster, Southbridge, Auburn, Northbridge, Oxford, Uxbridge, Millbury, Charlton, Spencer, Dudley, Leicester, Sturbridge, Sutton, Douglas, West Boylston and Warren. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Eastern Hampden; Northern Worcester; Southern Worcester
